info.title: Issuer server
info.description:
*List APIs for Issuer Portal* 
 ## Introduction 
 This API is documented for **Issuer Server**. 
 ## Authentication 
 **Issuer server** use **Jwz Token** for authentication.

parameters.name: issuerId
parameters.description: DID of Issuer Server that you want to login to.

requestBody.description: You must send your ZKProofs for login to Issuer Server.

post.description: Verify a JWZ Token and return true if this token is valid.

parameters.name: issuerId
parameters.description: DID of Issuer Server what you want to login to.

isValid.description: Return true if your JWZ token is valid, else return false

get.description: Generate proof input for claim login
API to get all issuers is registed in this server.

numHolders.description: Number Holders in this Issuer Servers.

post.description: Register a new Issuer by PublicKey

claimId.description: Id of Claims to generate input for zkProof Login to this Issuer.

get.description: Get challenge to publish PENDING claim and revoke PENDING_REVOKE claim

post.description: Issuer Publish ***ALL PENDING CLAIMS***. Then update new State of Issuer Tree to block chain
Revoke all PENDING_REVOKE claims. Then update new State of Issuer Tree to block chain
Publish all PENDING claims and Revoke all PENDING_REVOKE claims. Then update new State of Issuer Tree to block chain
